alert.note: Alert for Hatteras Island; Northern Outer Banks (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 6:43PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Dare County through 730 PM EDT... At 642 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wanchese, or 8 miles north of Stumpy Point, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nags Head, Salvo, Waves, Rodanthe, Manteo, Whalebone, Roanoke Island Festival Park, Jockeys Ridge State Park, Wanchese, Hatteras Island Fishing Pier, Bodie Island Lighthouse and Outer Banks Fishing Pier. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
